title: Live Session Quarantine + Credential Revocation
tagline: High-risk behavior triggers containment and revocation in one flow.
why_it_matters: Cuts incident response from manual minutes to automated seconds.
non_technical_script: When behavior crosses the risk threshold, AgentGate quarantines the active session.
Scoped credentials are revoked automatically so the agent cannot keep acting.
An incident report is signed and ready for security review.
technical_script: Risk score aggregates deterministic signal weights across recent trace events.
Exactly-once orchestration ensures retries never duplicate kill/revoke actions.
Incident state transitions and rollback steps are persisted for audit replay.
